message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its potential value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,300,000.  I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and the benefits it will bring you.

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,000,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price given the market value and my budget.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but the value of this product is truly significant.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,200,000.  This offer reflects my desire to reach a mutually beneficial deal.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, $1,200,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,100,000. I believe this price is more in line with what I'm willing to pay for the product.
